portfolio.title: SPEED Project
portfolio.subtitle: MongoDB, Next.js, Nest.js, & Node.js
portfolio.description: Software Practice Empirical Evidence Database (SPEED) uses the MNNN stack to help software engineering students find and evaluate empirical evidence on software engineering practices through a searchable NoSQL database, along with functionalities for submitting, moderating, analysing, and searching articles.
